title: Faith
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Faith par Ghost
[Cardinal Copia]
There is a scourge in the guise of sanctity
A perpetrator with a quill
Although it’s...
Often steeped in well spun mystery
The accuser sends the bill
Yeah!

[Cardinal Copia]
I am all eyes
I am all ears
I am the wall
And I’m watching you fall

[Cardinal Copia]
Beause faith is mine!


[Cardinal Copia]
The Luddites shun the diabolical
A fecal trail across the land
Although it...
Stinks, feels and looks identical
A pack of fools can take the stand
Ha!

[Cardinal Copia]
I am all eyes
I am all ears
I am the wall
And I’m watching you fall

[Cardinal Copia]
Because faith is mine!


I am all eyes
I am all ears
I am the wall
And I’m watching you fall
Hehehahahaha!

[Cardinal Copia]
I am all eyes
I am all ears
I am the wall
And I’m watching you fall
I am all eyes
I am all ears
I am the wall
And I’m watching you fall

[Cardinal Copia]
Because faith is mine!
